item.title: Instructions for configuring email with Outlook
item.description: Log in # To log in to Outlook, do the following: Step 1 # Open Outlook on your computer ( if your computer does not have Outlook software installed, you can refer to it here ). Step 2 # 2.1. Open the app # When successfully opening the application, it will display as shown below: 2.2. Add account # 2.2.1. Add # Click on File -> Info -> Add Account 2.
